title: Unused Storage Rules / Missing Client Upload

vulnerability_details.description: Storage rules exist for 'users/{userId}' but jobs expect 'user-uploads/{userId}'. No client code found using Firebase Storage.
vulnerability_details.exploitation: Confusion in storage paths can lead to misconfigured rules.
vulnerability_details.impact: Potential data leakage or inability to use feature.

steps: Implement client upload or remove unused rules
